item.title: US Strikes Venezuela As Trump Claims President Maduro Capture, Crypto Markets Don’t Flinch
item.description: Trump claims Venezuelan President Maduro was captured after the US strike, but Bitcoin and altcoins remain resilient.

item.title: US Strikes Venezuela As Trump Claims President Maduro Capture, Crypto Markets Don’t Flinch

item.title: Fed Balance Sheet Move Rekindles Crypto Risk-On Optimism, But Sentiment Remains Mixed
item.description: Analysts warned that elevated overnight repo usage at the Fed may signal underlying funding stress rather than a clean liquidity-driven rally, leaving...

item.title: Coinbase Executive D’Agostino Says Crypto ‘Market Structure Is Complicated’
item.description: Coinbase executive John D’Agostino stated that the United States should not fall behind because the market structure bill will be transformative.

item.title: Dogecoin Outperforms While Cardano, XRP Push Crypto Market Higher
item.description: Crypto analyst Julio Moreno questioned "whale accumulation" narratives, citing exchange wallet consolidation as distorting on-chain optics.
